sentences.en: "Tired and emotional" is a code word for being drunk.
sentences.cn: “又累又激动”是形容人喝醉酒的一种委婉说法。

sentences.en: Ann suffered from depression and a number of other emotional problems.
sentences.cn: 安患了抑郁症，还遇到一些其他的情绪问题。

sentences.en: Emotional conflict may shake the foundations of even the strongest relationship.
sentences.cn: 情感冲突可以动摇哪怕是最牢固的人际关系的基础。

sentences.en: He became very emotional when we had to leave.
sentences.cn: 当我们不得不离开时，他非常伤感。

sentences.en: He was able to sever all emotional bonds to his family.
sentences.cn: 他切断了和家人的所有感情纽带。

sentences.en: He was really screwed up with his emotional problems.
sentences.cn: 他深受情感问题的困扰。

sentences.en: How much emotional baggage is he bringing with him into the relationship?
sentences.cn: 他背负着多重的感情包袱开始这段恋情？

sentences.en: I don't get as emotional as I once did.
sentences.cn: 我不像以前那么冲动了。

sentences.en: I've been on an emotional roller-coaster since I've been here.
sentences.cn: 自从我到了这里，情绪就起伏不定。

sentences.en: Many men become more aware of emotional numbness in their 40s.
sentences.cn: 很多男性到了不惑之年以后会愈加意识到自己的情感麻木。

sentences.en: Often there are emotional reasons paralleling the financial ones.
sentences.cn: 往往情感方面的原因和经济方面原因同时存在。

sentences.en: She provided emotional support at a very distressing time for me.
sentences.cn: 在我非常痛苦的时候，她是我的情感支柱。

sentences.en: Some students have emotional problems that teachers feel ill equipped to handle.
sentences.cn: 一些学生的情感问题令老师们束手无策。

sentences.en: The conductor brought home the full thrust of the work's emotional resolution.
sentences.cn: 指挥将该作品情感上的毅然决然这一主旨充分表现了出来。

sentences.en: The emotional wounds of early childhood leave ineradicable scars.
sentences.cn: 童年早期的情感创伤留下了难以抚平的伤痕。

sentences.en: The funeral was a very emotional experience for all of us.
sentences.cn: 那次葬礼对我们大家来说都是一次无比伤感的经历。

sentences.en: the physical and emotional state of the patient
sentences.cn: 患者的生理和情绪状态

sentences.en: The tactics employed can range from overt bullying to subtle emotional blackmail.
sentences.cn: 从公然威吓到微妙的情感胁迫，各种战术都用上了。

sentences.en: They often seem depressed and close to emotional breakdown.
sentences.cn: 他们经常显得很沮丧，精神濒于崩溃的边缘。

sentences.en: W. Somerset Maugham's novel still packs an emotional punch.
sentences.cn: 威廉·萨默塞特·毛姆的小说仍具有强烈的情感冲击力。

words.tran_cn: 没有情感的；不露情感的
感情的；情绪的；表现感情的
感情上；情绪上；令人激动地；情绪冲动地
感情主义；诉诸感情；主情主义
易动感情的,感情脆弱的

phrases.tran_cn: 情绪智力；情商；情绪智商

trans.tran_cn: 感情的，有感染力的，情绪激动的
trans.tran_en: relating to your feelings or how you control them
